linernotes.title: Issue #000
linernotes.subtitle: Liner_Notes
linernotes.blurb: Introducing Liner_Notes, from Cambridge Audio. A new project in celebration of the people, the ideas and the technology shaping music today.

linernotes.title: Issue #001
linernotes.subtitle: Jerry Williams Singer, Songwriter
linernotes.blurb: The sound it made literally makes my belly flip... it was so good we tried to put it on every song. But that was a bit too much in the end

linernotes.title: Issue #002
linernotes.subtitle: Richard Wilkinson Studio Engineer, Mixer and Producer
linernotes.blurb: In the first entry in our Sound Professionals series, we speak to Richard Wilkinson, a man whose technical expertise and willingness to experiment has helped define British pop music. We discuss his views on the ‘loudness wars’ and his projects with Adele, Spice Girls and Hot Chip.

linernotes.title: Issue #003
linernotes.subtitle: Rattlesnake 4-piece alt-rock band
linernotes.blurb: We talk to Rattlesnake about their influencers, recording their first EP and how they go about writing new music.
